Phala Sutta：1．Phala SuttaThe cultivation of the five indriyas leads to one of two results：either realization in this life，or the state of anāgāmī．S．v．236．

2．Phala SuttaSame as （1），only substituting the four iddhipādas for the five indriyas．S．v．285f．

3．Phala SuttaOn seven fruits to be obtained from the cultivation of the four iddhipādas．S．v．285．

4．Phala SuttaFour conditions which，if cultivated，lead to the Four Fruits of the Path．S．v．410f．
